author: Greg Wyshynski
title: Built to win now, Vegas Golden Knights, the West's top seed, fail to reach Stanley Cup Final - ESPN
description: A penalty in overtime proved costly for Vegas on Monday, as Dallas secured its first berth in the Stanley Cup Final since 2000, leaving the top-seeded Golden Knights to wonder where it all went wrong.
content:
Coach Peter DeBoer was speechless as he walked into the Vegas Golden Knights' dressing room on Monday after Game 5 of the NHL's Western Conference finals.

description:

title: Astronomers find possible sign of life on Venus - CBS News
description: Telescopes in Hawaii and Chile spotted traces of phosphine, a noxious gas that on Earth is only associated with life.
